Name: Ailton Andrade de Oliveira
AboutMe:
I like science and its several branches. I hold a Bachelor's degree on Applied Mathematics and Master's in Neuroscience. So, it is not surprising that I enjoy reading about Philosophy, Cognitive Sciences, Semiotics, Computers (Hardware and Software), Ethology, Genetics, Astronomy and so on.

I really like reading (science fiction stories by Asimov and Clarke, in particular). Another passion is dancing. My favorite rythms are tango and gafieira.

I am a talkative guy, and I talk about everything. Of course, several times I am wrong but what really matter is the attempt to keep myself thinking about the time, the place, the people that surround us.

So, I am a very strange guy. Are you sure you want to reach me?

Think about it:

"If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them." - Isaac Asimov
